name: Exterior Timber Framing
template name: B07 - FC - S - Exterior Timber Framing

name: Setout completed, checked & accurate (no clashes & wall locations clearly marked)
Framing Dimensions / locations checked & accurate (openings considered where applicable)
All frames have been installed square, straight and plumb
DPC installed (if required) correctly
Fixings are correct to specification including any seismic/bracing requirements (attach relevant photos)
All Nogs (Service/Specialty) & penetrations - installed, checked & correct (consider acoustic & fire rating requirements)
All timber framing completed correctly to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
RAB
Fixing and spacings checked in accordance with manufacturers specs
White MS sealant for air seals between RAB board and concrete horizontal and vertical joints
3M taping around windows and external corners and vertical joints and horizontal flashing checked
Vaproshield to interfloor installed after vertical taping
Bracing checked and accurate
Penetrations and punctures sealed with flashing tape
Sealing joints over internal and external joints
Batten on RAB Board for cladding fixings
All RAB board installation completed to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman

Windows, Sliders and Sealants
template name: B07 - FC - S - Windows, Sliders and Sealants

name: Fixings and clearance around opening min 6mm & max 18mm and PEF rod/air seal are within acceptable tolerance level
Check taping around, before installing the windows and sliders
Packers to be correctly used and set back to allow continuous air seal
Jambs level and straight for finishing lines on the side
Door and window jambs flush to GIB Board
Check air seal is provided at the rear of the window reveal
All joints detailed as per attached Detail Document
All framing completed correctly within tolerance in respective area
Sill support fixing bars installed for all joinery within acceptable tolerance level
All windows, sliders and sealant installation completed to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
Brick Works
Preinstall checks
Area accessible, substrate acceptable & approval to start works - Consider services, cavity & waterproofing requirements prior to install
Ground clearance correct to specification
Grids/Wall marked for reference. RL reference/TOW confirmed. Base/Concrete/footing clean, tidy and level ready for first coarse.
Brick installation
Base of wall starting correct location - Brick base overhang within tolerances (no more than 20mm)
Control joints installed correctly
Weep holes installed correctly - Consider setout & size
Mortar Joints installed within tolerances (7-13mm)
Wall ties installed and aligning with specification (spacing, spans, length etc)
Horizontal shelf angles & lintel bars installed and correctly fixed where required - Consider horizontal and vertical alignment
All relevant flashings and waterproofing/taping completed as required - If Applicable
Caulking completed (correct colour) and satisfactory finish achieved
Brick cavity is correctly formed and free of obstructions
Brickwork completed to required specification. All brickwork washed/clean & area left clean & tidy - Wall built within tolerance - straight, level and to the correct height and colour
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS

Aircon channel installed

Trade seal installed

Flashing Installation
Head flashing installed with sealant at windows and doors (STO system)
Rainshield installed between joinery and lintel (brick)
DPC and WANZ bar installed at the bottom of the joinery (see fixing) as per manufacturer's spec
Aluminium window jamb side flashings are installed
All flashing installed at windows and doors to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
